existing_features.title: Reduce the height of the Begin Meditation and Save Ritual buttons proportionally on the pre-meditation page so they are appropriately sized when stacked in single column layout

Add a dynamic title to the meditation guide container on the pre-meditation page that corresponds to the selected meditation type (e.g., 'Meditation Guide', 'Mindfulness Guide', 'Metta Guide', 'Visualization Guide', 'IFS Guide')

new_feature_requests.summary: Add a semi-transparent background to the play/pause button on the meditation page using the app's main theme color, and implement a subtle hover glow effect
Reduce the height of the time control and volume control input containers on the meditation page to make them more compact
Fix the time control slider on the meditation page so it responds correctly: dragging left decreases time and dragging right increases time

projectName: Refine pre-meditation and meditation page UI controls
